project.description: this project is for opengauss website build every 8:15 am

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd $WORKSPACE echo "###### build repo ######"
echo "build repo is: website: $build_website and blog: $build_blog"
ARGOCD_APP_PROJECT="opengauss-hk-website" time=`date "+%Y%m%d%H%M%S"` build_version="v1.0.$time"
echo "build version: $build_version"
GITEE_EMAIL="xiangxinyong@huawei.com" website_imageId=""
project_name=website echo "###################################### build website: $build_website ######################################" cd "$WORKSPACE/openGauss-website" docker build -t ${project_name}:${build_version} . website_imageId=$(docker images | grep ${project_name} | grep ${build_version} | awk '{print $3}') sh /var/jenkins_home/swr_upload.sh opengauss ${project_name}:${build_version} echo "build website successful; $website_imageId"
echo "remote website images: $website_imageId" docker rmi -f $website_imageId
if [ -d "infra" ]; then rm -rf "infra" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GITEE_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GITEE_USER git clone https://$GITEE_USER:$GITEE_PASSWD@gitee.com/opengauss/infra cd infra/deploy/website else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opengauss/website:${build_version} else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update website:${build_version}" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
echo "website daily build task end."
